blips.name: Azure Bicep
blips.description: For those who prefer a more natural language than JSON for infrastructure code, Azure Bicep is a domain-specific language (DSL) that uses a declarative syntax. It supports reusable parameterized templates for modular resource definitions. A Visual Studio Code extension provides instant type-safety, intellisense and syntax checking, and the compiler allows bidirectional transpilation to and from ARM templates. Bicep's resource-oriented DSL and native integration with the Azure ecosystem make it a compelling choice for Azure infrastructure development
